root.name: Become A Web Developer - Part 22: Node.js
root.description: Node.js + Express.jsThis is the tutorial you've been looking for to become a web developer in 2020. It doesn’t just cover a small portion of the industry. In this multipart video series we will covers everything you need to know to get hired: from absolute zero knowledge to being able to put things on your resume that will allow you to live the life you want. Sounds too good to be true? Give me 5 minutes of your time to explain to you why I built this course and what is different here than thousands of other courses all over the internet.
